creator: AppsOfUse
descriptionHtml:
(This app is newly released to the Play Store. Please give Feedback if something doesn't work as it should)

Choices are the most powerful asset we own!
It’s ridiculous how much all other Blocking-Apps seem to ignore this fact.
Whilst it is widely known that we are choosing the direction of our life, most people seem to be fleeing into virtual worlds, feeding themselves with social media, too much unnecessary information or even worse – are addicted to instant gratification, in form of games, adult movies or unconscious actions. This is noting bad per se, but it seems to be less of choice the more we do it. We chose to quickly check a message on the phone, not to waste hours binging YouTube-Videos. And if it is getting even worser, we feel like our power to choose isn’t even existent.

That’s why my app is better (my humble opinion, no offence!), because it gives you the power back, to make more reflected decisions. It does that by showing a screen for a chosen duration, which gives you extra time to decide if you really want to open an app. It not only makes you think twice, but also shows you a chosen message, which increases the probability of you making the right choice!

If you want, it is a 21-days trial version. But I’d rather say it’s a 21-day program. I’m gonna be honest with you: After those 21 days you won’t even need iCT app anymore!

Before using iCT the first time do the following:
1. Write down the top 3 negative impacts of using your smartphone the wrong way. (If u need some ideas consult google and read websites such as e.g. https://bit.ly/2RYkbj6)
2. Write down the top 3 positive impacts of using your smartphone in a conscious, smart, right way.
3. Write down a short mission-statement (2-3 sentences) about why you are going to choose to use your smartphone in a more conscious way, using the 3 positive impacts u defined in step 2. (e.g. I choose to be more in control of my life, my time and my well- (or not-well)-being. I decide to be more conscious, focus on productive tasks and to spend more time with my family). Be conscious about the negative impacts but put your focus on the positive results you will get by using iCT.

WEEK 1: Now start iCT, and complete the following steps:
1. Allow usage-stats permission (needed to “block” other apps)
2. Choose which Apps you want to use more conscious in future.
3. Leave the “Skip immediately”-option as it is (OFF)
4. Set a duration of 10 seconds
5. As message, use your mission-statement we defined
6. Start iCT
7. Each time the iCT-block-screen opens, read your Mission-Statement out loud, and then choose to continue or close the app. If you need more time to reflect you can always pause the counter.
WEEK 2: Change the duration to something smaller (e.g. 5 seconds) (and press “Start iCT” again!). Still read out the statement each time!
WEEK 3: The same as week 2, only turn on the “Skip immediately”-option (Gives you the ability to continue immediately. It should happen automatically by now (even before you start an app!) but read (or recite) the statement each time.

WEEK 4: End of the trial version. The reciting of the statement and the conscious decision should be a habit till now. Leave a review on the Play Store and If you want to support me, please consider buying iCT.

Think of it. Good choices float like feathers while poor ones sink like anchors. Change your life now!
descriptionShort: Read the description to get to know how the app works!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Pause/Resume iCT from notification
- option to show system apps
- exclude from battery optimization
- minor layout improvements
- fixed list-bug (apps aren't checked but choosen
- major bug fixed (Apps can get unchoosen again)
- support android 10 +

5. As message, use your mission-statement we defined
6. Start iCT
7. Each time the iCT-block-screen opens, read your Mission-Statement out loud, and then choose to continue or close the app. If you need more time to reflect you can always pause the counter.

WEEK 4: Same as week 3, only activate the "skip immediately"-option. Probably you're so used to stating your statement, that you know it by heart and state it out even before opening an app!
Thanks for using iCT, maybe you want to give an review and/or donate (I'd be grateful!)

Think of it. Good choices float like feathers while poor ones sink like anchors. Change your life now!

descriptionShort: Make conscious choices, be productive, change habits & stop wasting time!!!

title: iChooseTo - think twice before opening an app!

creator: AppsOfUse
descriptionHtml:
!!! This app is newly released to the Play Store. Please give Feedback if something doesn't work as it should. Also there are some android versions which make it impossible for the app to work!!!

You find yourself wasting hours on semiproductive apps like YouTube, Instagram, Reddit or WhatsApp?
You've tried every app from the PlayStore that promised to make you more productive (Forest, Stay Focused, AppBlock, Freedom, HelpMeFocus, Digital Detox, ActuFlow) but you still have the bad habit to click on time-wasting apps without second thought?
Why is iChooseTo different?
1) It gives YOU the power to choose: You can use apps for productive and unproductive things. So why block them completely? iCT asks you if you really want to open the app and forces you to make conscious decisions
2) It stops you BEFORE you already wasted time: Many appblockers stop you after you run out of time. They "limit" the time you're able to waste. iCT makes it less probable that you waste time in the first place!

Give it a try, write a review with ideas for improvement and be a part in the process of making this the best "appblock-app" for android!

title: iChooseTo - think twice before opening an app!

creator: AppsOfUse
descriptionHtml:
!!! This app is newly released to the Play Store. Please give Feedback if something doesn't work as it should.

Functionalities::
- iCT: Before you open an app (of choice) you get displayed a block-screen (for a choosen amount of time), asking you if you really want to open it.
- re-iCT: Choose again after a certain amount of time
- iCT-on-unlock: Stop unconsciously checking your phone. iCT-on-unlock will show up each time you attempt to unlock your phone and ask you if you really want to do it.
- Don't-iCT: The decision stays valid for a certain amount of time even if you open the app multiple times

You find yourself wasting hours on semiproductive apps like YouTube, Instagram, Reddit or WhatsApp?
You've tried every app from the PlayStore that promised to make you more productive but you still have the bad habit to click on time-wasting apps without second thought?
Why is iChooseTo different?
1) It gives YOU the power to choose: You can use apps for productive and unproductive things. So why block them completely? iCT asks you if you really want to open the app and forces you to make conscious decisions
2) It stops you BEFORE you already wasted time: Many appblockers stop you after you run out of time. They "limit" the time you're able to waste. iCT makes it less probable that you waste time in the first place!

Give it a try, write a review with ideas for improvement and be a part in the process of making this the best "appblock-app" for android!
descriptionShort: Make conscious choices, be productive, change habits & stop wasting time!!!

title: iChooseTo - think twice before opening an app!

creator: AppsOfUse
descriptionHtml:
iChooseTo may not work on devices which are very restrictive with background processes (e.g. Samsung, OnePlus, Huawei, Xiaomi). Please visit dontkillmyapp.com to eventually make it work!

Main functionalities:
- iCT: Before you open an app (of choice) you get displayed a screen (for a choosen amount of time), asking you if you really want to open it.
- re-iCT: Choose again after a certain amount of time
- iCT-on-unlock: Stop unconsciously checking your phone. iCT-on-unlock will show up each time you attempt to unlock your phone and ask you if you really want to do it.

2) It stops you BEFORE you already wasted time: Many appblockers stop you after you run out of time. They "limit" the time you're able to waste. iCT makes it less probable that you waste time in the first place!

Give it a try, write a review with ideas for improvement and be a part in the process of making this the best "appblock-app" for android!

title: iChooseTo - think twice before opening an app!

creator: AppsOfUse.com
descriptionHtml:
iChooseTo may not work on devices which are very restrictive with background processes (e.g. Samsung, OnePlus, Huawei, Xiaomi). Please visit dontkillmyapp.com to eventually make it work!

Main functionalities:
- iCT: Before you open an app (of choice) you get displayed a screen (for a choosen amount of time), asking you if you really want to open it.
- re-iCT: Choose again after a certain amount of time
- iCT-on-unlock: Stop unconsciously checking your phone. iCT-on-unlock will show up each time you attempt to unlock your phone and ask you if you really want to do it.
